alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 4:25AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, EAST CENTRAL ASCENSION, ST. JAMES AND SOUTHEASTERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES THROUGH 515 AM CST... At 424 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Convent, or 12 miles southeast of Donaldsonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Edgard, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Wallace, Montz, Killona, South Vacherie, and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 190 and 213. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. John The Baptist
